keyMoments.title: Coated Ship Strategy Revealed
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates execute their trump card strategy using a hidden coated paddle ship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's tactical coordination and Whitebeard's strategic planning.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Reach the Plaza
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates breach Marineford's defenses and successfully enter the plaza.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the final phase of the battle as they get within range of rescuing Ace.
